actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution urging the telephone and hearing aid industries to provide full access to telephone communications for hearing aid users.

summary.text: Urges the telephone and hearing aid industries to utilize all available technology to provide full access to telephone communications for hearing aid users.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution urging the telephone and hearing aid industries to provide full access to telephone communications for hearing aid users.
